means: 苦工，贱役，单调沉闷的工作

sentence.Network_en: He spent his life in pointlessly tiresome drudgery.

sentence.Network_en: People want to get away from the drudgery of their everyday lives.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们想摆脱日常生活中单调乏味的工作。

sentence.Network_en: The Prince of Darkness does not condescend to such cheap drudgery.

entry.tran: 单调乏味的苦差事;无聊的工作
entry.def: You use drudgery to refer to jobs and tasks which are boring or unpleasant but which must be done.

example.ex: People want to get away from the drudgery of their everyday lives.
example.tran: 人们想摆脱日常生活中单调乏味的工作。
